profile_summary:
As a skilled Backend Developer with 8 years of experience, I excel in designing and implementing robust APIs and backend solutions utilizing **.NET**, **Spring Boot**, and **AWS** technologies. My ability to ensure data validation and maintain high-performance standards has been proven in dynamic environments. I am well-versed in Agile methodologies, allowing me to contribute effectively within collaborative team settings.

In addition, I have a solid foundation in modern programming languages such as Java, which complements my backend development expertise. My experience extends to integrating and optimizing full-stack applications, working with frontend frameworks when necessary, and prioritizing secure coding practices. I've successfully led projects in the healthcare and financial sectors, focusing on compliance with standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS, ensuring that systems remain secure and efficient.
